attributes.action: Have the age limit reduced in England and Wales to 20  for cervical smears to keep in line with Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The age for taking smears varies all over Britain --in Scotland it is 20 , but 25 in England.It should be the same to reduce the incidence of cervical cancer.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
